data.title: Notice Regarding State Stay-At-Home Order Issued December 3, 2020
data.excerpt: On Thursday, December 3, 2020, Governor Gavin Newsom issued a new Stay-at-Home Order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians and to continue facilitating a consistent approach across the state to slow the spread of COVID-19.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
